title: Find a Cure

Get Auntie Ethel's help

NOTE: The section below of this walkthrough takes place once you've entered Emerald Grove.

Inside the grove at this location (X:193 Y:548), you'll find an old lady named Auntie Ethel. Interact with her and she'll start off by saying you're the talk of the camp, as she cont
